Author: FriendWithAKid
Text: Thank you for your reply. I'm glad I'm not alone. I hope we both fill our hearts and stomachs in the future :)

Author: laisserai
Text: I feel the same way. You're not alone  I recently got rejected from one of the places I applied to for grad school and I just feel useless. I always have an appetite (restrict binge restrict binge and repeat) but I don't have one anymore. I've lost a lot of weight in the past week and although I know I should eat something of substance I just want nothing.  My body feeling as empty as my heart feels is somewhat comforting.
